Mayor Adams unveils details of $650 million plan to tackle street homelessness

public_announcements: Mayor Adams highlights free cultural events and festivals.
Department of Transportation expects toll to end in mid-April.
world_state.public_health_status: No significant public health concerns reported.
world_state.public_safety_status: Neighborhoods grappling with higher crime rates compared to other parts of the city.

I will put on my noise cancelling headphones to block out the noise.
